Options.OPTION_DESCRIPTION[NoPollution.N: When enabled air pollution from entities that cause air pollution will be set to 0 and disables the air pollution slider
Gives control over how much should entiites that cause air pollution be set to

This will reset the air pollution that is seen on the map so pollution will build up over time. So a hypothetical amount of air pollution would be 1000 and pressing this button would reset the air pollution back to 0
When enabled net pollution from net entities (for example roads) that cause net pollution will be set to 0 and disables the net pollution slider
Gives control over how much should entiites that cause net pollution be set to
Gives control over how much should entiites that cause net pollution be set to
Adjusts the accumulation rate of pollution generated by net entities, such as roads and other infrastructure. Use this slider to control the impact of pollution accumulation over time.
Adjusts the accumulation rate of pollution generated by net entities, such as roads and other infrastructure. Use this slider to control the impact of pollution accumulation over time.
Reset the net pollution that is seen on the map
When enabled noise pollution from entities that cause noise pollution will be set to 0 and disables the noise pollution slider
Gives control over how much should entiites that cause noise pollution be set to

This will reset the noise pollution that is seen on the map so pollution will build up over time. So a hypothetical amount of noise pollution would be 1000 and pressing this button would reset the noise pollution back to 0
When enabled ground pollution from entities that cause ground pollution will be set to 0 and disables the ground pollution slider
Gives control over how much should entiites that cause ground pollution be set to

This will reset the ground pollution that is seen on the map so pollution will build up over time. So a hypothetical amount of ground pollution would be 1000 and pressing this button would reset the ground pollution back to 0
Adjust the speed at which groundwater pollution is reduced. Choose between no reduction, normal, fast, or instant reduction.
Set water pollution decay rate to 1000
Set water pollution decay rate
Set ground pollution multiplier. Base value and default value are 20. 0 means no ground pollution multiplier
Set air pollution multiplier. Base value and default value are 25. 0 means no air pollution multiplier
Set noise pollution multiplier. Base value and default value are 100. 0 means no noise pollution multiplier
Set net air pollution multiplier. Base value and default value are 1.75. 0 means no net air pollution multiplier
Set net noise pollution multiplier. Base value and default value are 5. 0 means no net noise pollution multiplier
Set plant air multiplier. Base value and default value are 0.001. 0 means no plant air multiplier
Set plant ground multiplier. Base value and default value are 0.001. 0 means no plant ground multiplier
Set Fertility Ground Multiplier Base value and default value are 1. 0 means no fertility ground multiplier
Set Abandoned Noise Pollution Multiplier. Base value and default value are 5. 0 means no Abandoned Noise Pollution multiplier
Set ground pollution radius. Base value and default value are 100. 0 means no ground pollution radius
Set air pollution radius. Base value and default value are 100. 0 means no air pollution radius
Set noise pollution radius. Base value and default value are 100. 0 means no noise pollution radius
Set net noise pollution radius. Base value and default value are 8. 0 means no net noise pollution radius
Set air pollution fade. Base value and default value are 100. 0 (0%) means no air pollution fade. 200% means an increased air pollution fade
Set ground pollution fade. Base value and default value are 100. 0 (0%) means no ground pollution fade. 200% means an increased ground pollution fade
Set plant fade. Base value and default value are 2. 0 means no plant fade
If happiness effect from air pollution is less than this, the notification will be shown. Base value and default value are -7.
If happiness effect from noise pollution is less than this, the notification will be shown. Base value and default value are -7.
If happiness effect from ground pollution is less than this, the notification will be shown. Base value and default value are -7.
The speed at which wind travels from one place to another. This parameter likely affects how fast air pollution travels too. Base value and default value are 20.
The exponent of the distance between air pollution sources. The distance at which noise pollution clouds will fall off compared to their source. Base value and default value are 1.5.
Set the noise pollution of the homeless. Base value and default value are 50. 0 means no homeless noise pollution
The divisor is the pollution value. The higher the pollution, the more the land value goes down. Base and default value are 500.
This will reset all advanced parameters (multipliers, radii, fades, etc.) to their default settings.
